name: vidzi.tv Dark Theme
description: Featuring responsive player sizes and a dark themed background with no extra links below player.

user.name: badjokr
user.about: I enjoy making styles that make websites look better.

additional_info:
Player will resize according to your browser width. :)
video player sizes being:
Under 720p = 360p player size
720p = 480p player size
1080p = 720p player size
Over 1080p = 1080p player size

If you run into any problems while using this style, please reply in the comments.

made an attempt to not display ad overlays.
